皯字的基本解释

皯
gǎn
皮肤黧黑枯槁。

皯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gǎn］
［《廣韻》古旱切，上旱，見。］
面色枯焦黝黑。

皯字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【皮字部】　皯； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页790第18
【唐韻】【集韻】?古旱切，干上聲。【說文】面黑氣也。【博雅】病也。【列子·黃帝篇】焦然肌色皯黣。　又【廣韻】工旦切【集韻】【韻會】居案切，?干去聲。義同。　【集韻】或作䵟?。【廣韻】亦書作?。

皯字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
皯字的起名意思

暂无。

皯
Basic explanation of words
皯
gǎn
The skin is black and withered.
皯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gǎn］
["Guangyun" ancient drought cut, drought, see. ]
His complexion was scorched and dark.
皯
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Pi Word Department] 　皯; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 790 18
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ancient dry cut, dry sound. [Said the text] The face is black and angry. [Bo Ya] Illness too. [Liezi·Huangdi Chapter] Jiao Ran has a dark skin tone.　 [Guang Yun] Gong Dan cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ju Jian cut, go dry. The same meaning.　【Ji Yun】or as Tong?. [Guang Yun] Also written by books?.
